name: Swap the Pics
description:
No more guessing Words ! JUST PLAY WITH PICS !
We Bring you SWAP THE PICS
There are 9 pics in a Puzzle and you will have to identify the three common ones.
Once you do that ,just drag them to the answer line.
So have Fun in this New Way to solve the Picture Puzzles with more 1000 pics and 150 levels to play
